UserStory.heading: Achievement
UserStory.Description: As a player, I would like to see an achievement system added to the game that could provide me with a sense of satisfaction upon completing certain objectives.
UserStory.DescriptionZH: 比如在指定时间通关，或者死亡过多次
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. It doesn't concern other features. N - Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation. Confirmation of specific details can be negotiated. V - Yes. The player will have better in-game experience. E - Yes. It can be estimated how long it will take since it is a small feature. S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore completed in one iteration or Sprint. T - Yes. It can be tested and verified by playing the game.
